## IPlotArea interface

The space a plot takes up on a chart.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface IPlotArea 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [interactiveRange](./core.iplotarea.interactiverange.md) | IReadonlyRange2d&lt;Float32Array&gt; | In clip space, must be equivalent to data area for interaction handlers to work. |
|  [wholeRange](./core.iplotarea.wholerange.md) | IReadonlyRange2d&lt;Float32Array&gt; | In clip space, includes any axis etc if present. |
